review.title: “I had 35 years of warehousing, inventorying and logistics experience at Michael E. DeBakey.”
review.pros: Pros – As a veteran, I love servicing my customers. Working here gives you chance to advance up the ladder in logistics.
review.cons: Cons – We needed more employees to give the wounded veterans totally the very best of care that they deserve. So at all time I gave my Best Customer Care.
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – I believe sometime management should work a day in other areas of there company to see the big picture.

review.title: “I really enjoy working there. I was given a task and I went to fulfilled it.”
review.pros: Pros – The hours are great and always something to do. Working with the people there makes it worth to keep the job.
review.cons: Cons – Well you will always seem to get that loud mouth person who no body wants to work with.And you tell him/she boy you really don't look well and hoping they go HOME.
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – They are the most respectful towards their employees. Thats all I have to say.
